name: Zero Connector
description: Zero Connector is a visual Web3 automation platform that enables anyone to build sophisticated trading bots and AI-powered workflows on Solana without writing code. What It Does Zero Connector provides a drag-and-drop workflow builder with 18+ integration nodes that let users: Build Trading Bots: Create automated strategies using real-time data from DexScreener and CoinGecko, execute swaps via Jupiter Aggregator AI-Powered Analysis: Leverage LLMs (GPT, Gemini) to analyze charts, tweets, news, and market data to make autonomous trading decisions Anonymous Transactions: Send SOL and USDC privately through ShadowWire encrypted vaults (1% relayer fee) Social Monitoring: Track Twitter/X accounts and trigger actions based on influencer activity Telegram Integration: Receive alerts, trigger workflows remotely, and interact with agents via Telegram bot Key Features Visual Workflow Builder: Drag, drop, and connect nodes to compose complex agentic workflows Real-Time Market Data: Live charts and price feeds from DexScreener, CoinGecko, and on-chain sources AI Nodes: AI Assistant for analysis, Synapse for data extraction, Blocker for conditional logic On-Chain Actions: Token swaps (Jupiter), transactions, and private transfers (ShadowWire) Scheduled Automation: Set intervals to run workflows automatically X402 Protocol Support: Connect to external AI agents and PayAI network endpoints Use Cases Automated DCA (Dollar Cost Averaging) strategies Sentiment-based trading triggered by Twitter activity Price alert notifications via Telegram Anonymous payment automation AI-driven market analysis and reporting
